'''Hilichurl Shooters''' are [[Hilichurls]] who use crossbows in battle.

They fire single bolts, which are [[Elemental Infusion|infused]] if the hilichurl is affiliated with an element. In some [[Domains]], [[Events]] and [[Commissions]], they will fire five bolts in a ~45 degree spread in front of them instead.
